name: Shitty Platformer (reasons_1-1)
description:
This is my student game from December 2021, with about 1 year of Unity experience from college. Obviously it's not finished or polished, but I had a lot of fun making it! I hope to add more to this in the future. I had a lot of fun making the characters!

Controls:

- (when the game starts, press C or click on the character icon)

- arrow keys to move, space to jump / double jump 

 - as Jack (the human), press down arrow in midair to surf on his sword

 - as Stout (the dragon), hold the up arrow to hover in midair

- later in the level, press V to bring up the character select, B and C to switch

also credit to Fearofdark on Youtube for the music!
